title: Search Campaign Hiearchy Detail
description: Adobe AdCloud Search Campaign Hierarchy Details

xdm:seaccountId.title: Search Engine Account ID
xdm:seaccountId.description: Unique identifier for the account this event is associated to.

xdm:secampaignId.title: Search Engine Campaign ID
xdm:secampaignId.description: Unique identifier for the campaign which this event is associated to.

xdm:seadgroupId.title: Search Engine AdGroup ID
xdm:seadgroupId.description: Unique identifier for the adgroup which this event is associated to.

xdm:setermId.title: Search Term ID
xdm:setermId.description: Unique identifier for the search term which this event is associated to.

xdm:seadvertiserId.title: Internal Advertiser or User ID
xdm:seadvertiserId.description: Unique identifier for the advertiser which this event is associated to.

xdm:secreativeId.title: Search Engine Ad ID
xdm:secreativeId.description: Unique identifier for the creative or ad which this event is associated to.

xdm:networkId.title: Search Engine ID
xdm:networkId.description: Unique identifier for the Search Engine which this event is associated to.

xdm:matchType.title: Keyword Match Type
xdm:matchType.description: Match Type associated to the Keyword being targeted for the Ad.
